name="GetRequestStatus"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:riv:clinical:process:activity:request:GetRequestStatusResponder:1:GetRequestStatus" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header use="literal" message="tns:GetRequestStatusRequest" part="LogicalAddress"/> <soap:body use="literal" parts="parameters"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="GetRequestStatusResponderService"> <wsdl:port name="GetRequestStatusResponderPort" binding="tns:GetRequestStatusResponderBinding"> <soap:address location="http://tempuri.org"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn:riv:clinicalprocess:activity:request:1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="urn:riv:clinicalprocess:activity:request:1" xmlns:codes="urn:riv:clinicalprocess:activity:request:codes"> <xs:import namespace="urn:riv:clinicalprocess:activity:request:codes" schemaLocation="codes.xsd"/> <!--Remiss--> <xs:element name="request" type="RequestType"/> <!--Remissvar--> <xs:element name="requestOutcome" type="RequestOutcomeType"/> <!--Remissbekräftelse--> <xs:element name="requestConfirmation" type="RequestConfirmationType"/> <!--Remisstatus--> <xs:element name="requestStatus" type="RequestStatusType"/> <xs:element name="personId" type="PersonIdType"/> <xs:element name="requestId" type="RequestIdType"/> <xs:complexType name="RequestType"> <xs:sequence> <!--remiss-id--> <xs:element name="requestId" type="RequestIdType"/> <!--remisstyp--> <xs:element name="typeOfRequest" type="codes:codeForRequestType"/> <!--versionstidpunkt--> <xs:element name="versionTimeStamp" type="TimeStampType"/> <!--versions-id--> <xs:element name="versionNumber" type="VersionNumberType"/> <!--versionorsak + versionsorsak text--> <xs:element name="reasonForVersion" type="ReasonForVersionType"/> <!--berör Patient--> <xs:element name="patient" type="PatientType"/> <!--ursprunglig remitterande organisatorisk enhet--> <xs:element name="requestOrganisation" type="FullOrganisationType"/> <!--har remitterande HoS-personal/Organisatorisk enhet--> <xs:element name="author" type="RequestAuthorType"/> <!--har remissmottagande Organisatorisk enhet--> <xs:element name="recipient" type="RecipientType"/> <!--har vidareskickande--> <xs:element name="intermediaryParticipant" type="IntermediaryType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <!--kompletterande administrativ information--> <xs:element name="additionalInformation" type="AdditionalInformationType"/> <!--Varningsinformation--> <xs:element name="awarenessInformation" type="AwarenessInformationType" minOccurs="0"/> <!--innehåller Frågeställning--> <xs:element name="questionFormulation" type="QuestionFormulationType"/> <!--erfordrar Betalningsförbindelse--> <xs:element name="paymentCommitment" type="PaymentCommitmentType" minOccurs="0"/> <!--bilaga--> <xs:element name="attachment" type="AttachmentType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <!--id för individanpassad vårdprocess--> <xs:element name="careProcessId" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RequestConfirmationType"> <xs:sequence> <!--besvarar remiss.remiss-id--> <xs:element name="requestId" type="RequestIdType"/> <!--svars-id--> <xs:element name="requestConfirmationId" type="RequestIdType"/> <!--svarsmeddelandetyp--> <xs:element name="typeOfRequestConfirmation" type="codes:codeRequestConfirmationType"/> <!--eRemiss.versions-id--> <xs:element name="requestVersionNumber" type="VersionNumberType"/> <xs:element name="requestConfirmationTime" type="TimeStampType"/> <xs:element name="patient" type="SimplePatientType"/> <!--besvarande organisatorisk enhet--> <xs:element name="confirmingOrganisation" type="FullOrganisationType"/> <xs:element name="author" type="AuthorType"/> <xs:element name="recipient" type="RecipientType"/> <xs:element name="forwardingRecipient" type="RecipientType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="outcome" type="RequestReceivedConfirmationOutcomeType"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RequestOutcomeType"> <xs:sequence> <!--besvarar eRemiss.eRemiss-id--> <xs:element name="requestId" type="RequestIdType"/> <!--svars-id--> <xs:element name="requestOutcomeId" type="RequestIdType"/> <!--svarsmeddelandetyp--> <xs:element name="typeOfRequestOutcome" type="codes:codeRequestOutcomeType"/> <!--eRemiss.versions-id--> <xs:element name="requestVersionNumber" type="VersionNumberType"/> <xs:element name="requestOutcomeTime" type="TimeStampType"/> <xs:element name="patient" type="SimplePatientType"/> <!--besvarande organisatorisk enhet--> <xs:element name="respondingOrganisation" type="FullOrganisationType"/> <xs:element name="author" type="AuthorType"/> <xs:element name="recipient" type="RecipientType"/> <xs:element name="outcome" type="OutcomeType"/> <!--bilaga--> <xs:element name="attachment" type="AttachmentType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RequestStatusType"> <xs:sequence> <!--RemissStatus-id--> <xs:element name="requestStatusId" type="RequestStatusIdType" minOccurs="0"/> <!--RemissStatus--> <xs:element name="requestStatus" type="CVType"/> <!--RemissStatustid--> <xs:element name="statusTime" type="TimeStampType"/> <!--RemissStatussättare--> <xs:element name="statusSetter" type="SimpleAuthorType"/> <!--eRemiss.id--> <xs:element name="requestId" type="RequestIdType"/> <!--eRemiss.versions-id--> <xs:element name="requestVersionNumber" type="VersionNumberType"/> <!--eRemisstyp--> <xs:element name="typeOfRequest" type="CVType"/> <!--eRemissmedium--> <xs:element name="requestMedium" type="CVType"/> <!--organisatorisk enhet--> <xs:element name="requestOrganisation" type="RequestStatusOrganisationType"/> <!--eRemiss.har remitterande HoS-personal--> <xs:element name="requestAuthor" type="SimpleAuthorType"/> <!--eRemiss.berör Patient--> <xs:element name="patient" type="SimplePatientType"/> <!--eRemiss.har remissmottagande Organisatorisk enhet--> <xs:element name="recipient" type="FullRecipientType"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Type for requestId and requestOutcomId--> <xs:complexType name="RequestIdType"> <xs:attribute name="extension" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="256"/> <xs:pattern value="(.*)#(.*)"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TimeStampType"> <xs:attribute name="value" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="(19|20)\d\d(0[1-9]|1[012])(0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])\d{4,6}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TelecomType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="typeOfTelecom" type="codes:codeForTelecomType"/> <xs:element name="number" type="TelecomNumberType"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReasonForVersionType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="typeOfReason" type="codes:codeVersionReason"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Patient type--> <xs:complexType name="PatientType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="personId" type="PersonIdType"/> <xs:element name="address" type="AddressType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="telecom" type="TelecomType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="2"/> <xs:element name="name" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="216"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="gender" type="codes:codeForGenderType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="dateOfBirth" type="DateType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!----> <xs:complexType name="SimplePatientType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="personId" type="PersonIdType"/> <xs:element name="name" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="216"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Version number only allows a number of 1 and higher. with leading 0 Examples: 1 01 0001 2 and so on--> <xs:simpleType name="VersionNumberType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="(0*[1-9]+|[1-9])\d*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Telecom number format +123-12345678--> <xs:simpleType name="TelecomNumberType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="200"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Date format SSYYMMDD--> <xs:complexType name="DateType"> <xs:attribute name="value" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="(19|20)\d\d(0[1-9]|1[012])(0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PersonIdType"> <xs:attribute name="extension" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{8}[0-9pPtTfF][0-9]{3}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="root" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="1.2.752.129.2.1.3.1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Personnummer</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="1.2.752.129.2.1.3.3"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Nationellt samordningsnummer</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <!--Type for carrying an address, modelled after Skatteverket Navet with addition of postBox--> <xs:complexType name="AddressType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="careOf" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="35"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="streetName1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="35"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="streetName2" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="35"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="postalCode"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="5"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="postalCity"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="27"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="postBox" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AuthorType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="healthcareProfessional" type="HealthcareProfessionalType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="typeOfHealthcareProfessional" type="codes:codeForProfession" minOccurs="0"/> <!--custodian + author.representedOrganisation--> <xs:element name="healthcareProfessionalOrganisation" type="OrganisationType"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RequestAuthorType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="date" type="DateType"/> <xs:element name="healthcareProfessional" type="HealthcareProfessionalType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="typeOfHealthcareProfessional" type="codes:codeForProfession" minOccurs="0"/> <!--custodian + author.representedOrganisation--> <xs:element name="healthcareProfessionalOrganisation" type="OrganisationType"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="SimpleAuthorType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="healthcareProfessional" type="HealthcareProfessionalType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="healthcareProfessionalOrganisation" type="RequestStatusOrganisationType"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="IntermediaryType"> <xs:sequence> <!--custodian--> <xs:element name="healthcareProfessionalOrganisation" type="OrganisationType"/> <xs:element name="time" type="TimeStampType"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RecipientType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="organisation" type="OrganisationType"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="FullRecipientType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="healthcareProfessionalOrganisation" type="RequestStatusOrganisationType"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--healthcareProfessional id and healthcareProfessional name restrictions mirrors HSA--> <xs:complexType name="HealthcareProfessionalType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="HsaIdType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="name"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="64"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="HsaIdType"> <xs:attribute name="extension" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="64"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OrganisationType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="careUnitId" type="HsaIdType"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="FullOrganisationType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Information om en organisationsenhet. Hämtad från http://rivta.googlecode.com Anpassad (mestadels språkligt) till NeR.
Anges careUnitId bör inga andra fält anges. Anges inte careUnitId bör åtminstone careUnitName anges.
careUnitId: HSA-id för enhet careUnitName Namn på enhet careUnitTelephone: Telefon till enhet careUnitEmail: Epost till enhet careUnitAddress: Postadress till enhet careUnitLocation: Text som anger namnet på plats eller ort för enhetens eller funktionens fysiska placering</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="careUnitId" type="HsaIdType"/> <xs:element name="careUnitName" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="64"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="careUnitTelephone" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="careUnitEmail" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="careUnitAddress" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="careUnitLocation" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RequestStatusOrganisationType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Information om en organisationsenhet. Hämtad från http://rivta.googlecode.com Anpassad (mestadels språkligt) till NeR.
Anges careUnitId bör inga andra fält anges. Anges inte careUnitId bör åtminstone careUnitName anges.
careUnitId: HSA-id för enhet careUnitName Namn på enhet careUnitTelephone: Telefon till enhet careUnitEmail: Epost till enhet careUnitAddress: Postadress till enhet careUnitLocation: Text som anger namnet på plats eller ort för enhetens eller funktionens fysiska placering</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="careUnitId" type="HsaIdType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="careUnitName" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="64"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="careUnitTelephone" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="careUnitEmail" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="careUnitAddress" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="careUnitLocation" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AdditionalInformationType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="desiredRequestRecipient" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="200"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="administrativeInformation" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="8192"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="interpreterRequirement" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="200"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AwarenessInformationType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="text"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="8192"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Question Formulation--> <xs:complexType name="QuestionFormulationType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="text"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="8192"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <!--Anamnes 0..1--> <xs:element name="clinicalInformation" type="ClinicalInformationType" minOccurs="0"/> <!--Condition 0..*--> <xs:element name="condition" type="ConditionType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <!--Desired activities 0..*--> <xs:element name="desiredActivity" type="ActivityType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ClinicalInformationType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="text"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="8192"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Condition Types--> <xs:complexType name="ConditionType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="ConditionIdType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="text" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="8192"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="code" type="codes:codeForCondition" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ConditionIdType"> <xs:attribute name="extension" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="(.*)"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <!--Activity types--> <xs:complexType name="ActivityType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="ActivityIdType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="text" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="8192"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="code" type="ActivityCodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ActivityIdType"> <xs:attribute name="extension" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="(.*)"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <!----> <xs:complexType name="ActivityCodeType"> <xs:attribute name="code" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="(.*)"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="codeSystem" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="1.2.752.116.1.3.2.1.4"/> <xs:enumeration value="1.2.752.116.2.1.1"/> <!--KVÅ--> <!--Snomed CT--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <!--Answer section of a request response--> <xs:complexType name="OutcomeType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="outcomeText"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="8192"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="condition" type="ConditionType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="accomplishedActivity" type="ActivityType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RequestReceivedConfirmationOutcomeType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="outcomeText"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="8192"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Date type--> <xs:complexType name="TimeIntervalType"> <xs:attribute name="low"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="(19|20)\d\d(0[1-9]|1[012])(0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="high"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="(19|20)\d\d(0[1-9]|1[012])(0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TimePeriodType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Används för att specificera ett datumintervall med hjälp av start- och slutdatum.
start: Startdatum på formatet YYYYMMDDhhmmss end: Slutdatum på formatet YYYYMMDDhhmmss</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="start" type="TimeStampType"/> <xs:element name="end" type="TimeStampType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentCommitmentType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="paymentCommitmentId" type="PaymentCommitmentIdType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="commitmentType" type="codes:codeForCommitmentType"/> <xs:element name="commitmentTypeChapter" type="codes:codeForCommitmentTypeChapter" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="validity" type="TimeIntervalType"/> <xs:element name="clinicalResponsibilityDescription" type="ResponsibilityDescriptionType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="administrativeResponsibilityDescription" type="ResponsibilityDescriptionType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="validOnlyForOutpatientCare" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="liableCountyCouncil" type="codes:codeForCountyCouncil"/> <xs:element name="dateOfApproval" type="TimeStampType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="issuedInConsultationWith" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="64"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="costCenter" minOccurs="0"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="64"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="reimbursementInformation" type="ReimbursementInformationType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="approvedBy" type="HealthcareProfessionalType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CVType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Hämtad från http://rivta.googlecode.com
Typ som beskriver kodade värden med en struktur hämtad från HL7 v3 CV (”CodedValue”). För implementering av attribut av slaget ”KTOV” i RIV. Kodade värden avser officiellt hanterade kodverk som hänvisas till med CodeSystem OID/UUID.
För annan användning av koder, exempelvis för lokala kodverk utan OID, skall originalText-attributet användas för att ge kodens text i det lokala systemet, och övriga attribut lämnas tomma.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="codeSystem" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="codeSystemName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="codeSystemVersion" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="displayName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="originalText" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReimbursementInformationType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="reimbursementType" type="codes:codeForReimbursementType"/> <xs:element name="ownerOfInvokedContract" type="codes:codeForCountyCouncil"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentCommitmentIdType"> <xs:attribute name="extension" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="(.*)"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ResponsibilityDescriptionType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="8192"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="RequestStatusIdType"> <xs:attribute name="extension" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="(.*)"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AttachmentType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="urn" type="URNType"/> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="mimetype" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="size" type="xs:long"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="InstructionType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="sourceOfInformation" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="url" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="text" type="xs:string"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="URNType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Regular expression to validate RFC 2141 URN syntax. "urn:[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,31}:([a-zA-Z0-9()+,.:=@;$_!*'-]|%[0-9A-Fa-f]{2})+"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:anyURI"> <xs:pattern value="urn:[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,31}:([a-zA-Z0-9()+,.:=@;$_!*'-]|%[0-9A-Fa-f]{2})+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ResultCodeEnum"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="OK"/> <xs:enumeration value="ERROR"/> <xs:enumeration value="INFO"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ErrorCodeEnum"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="VALIDATION_ERROR"/> <xs:enumeration value="APPLICATION_ERROR"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="ResultType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation></xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="resultCode" type="ResultCodeEnum"/> <xs:element name="errorCode" type="ErrorCodeEnum" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="logId" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="subCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

</xs:complexType> <!--List of type of agreements that support the payment agreement--> <xs:complexType name="codeForCommitmentType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Anger förbindelsetyper för avtal</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="code" type="codeForCommitmentType_values" use="required"/> <!--Fixed attributes not needed in greenCDA <xs:attribute name="codeSystem" use="required" fixed="1.2.752.129.2.2.2.44"/>--> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="codeForCommitmentType_values"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:enumeration value="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Riksavtal</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="2"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Regionavtal</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> chapters within Riksavtalet that support the payment agreement--> <xs:complexType name="codeForCommitmentTypeChapter"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Anger förbindelsetyper för avtalskapitel</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="code" type="codeForCommitmentTypeChapter_values" use="required"/> <!--Fixed attributes not needed in greenCDA <xs:attribute name="codeSystem" use="required" fixed="1.2.752.129.2.2.X.X"/>--> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="codeForCommitmentTypeChapter_values"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:enumeration value="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Kap 2 Vård efter initiativ från hemlandstinget</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="2"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Kap 2 Vårdgaranti</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="3"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Kap 3 Akutvård</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="4"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Kap 4 Patientens val</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--List of Sweden's 21 county councils ("landsting")--> <xs:complexType name="codeForCountyCouncil"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Anger Sveriges 21 landsting</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="code" type="codeForCountyCouncil_values" use="required"/> <!--Fixed attributes not needed in greenCDA <xs:attribute name="codeSystem" use="required" fixed="1.2.752.2.2.1.18"/>--> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="codeForCountyCouncil_values"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:enumeration value="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Stockholms län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="3"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Uppsala län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="4"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Södermanlands län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="5"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Östergötlands län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="6"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Jönköpings län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="7"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Kronobergs län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="8"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Kalmar län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="9"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Gotlands län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="10"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Blekinge län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="12"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Skåne län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="13"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Hallands län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="14"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Västra Götalands län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="17"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Värmlands län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="18"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Örebro län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="19"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Västmanlands län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="20"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Jämtlands län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="24"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Västerbottens län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="25"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Norrbottens län</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--List of valid types of reimbursements--> <xs:complexType name="codeForReimbursementType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Anger källor till ersättning</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="code" type="codeForReimbursementType_values" use="required"/> <!--Fixed attributes not needed in greenCDA <xs:attribute name="codeSystem" use="required" fixed="1.2.752.129.2.2.X.X"/>--> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="codeForReimbursementType_values"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:enumeration value="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Ersättning från patientens hemlandsting enligt reglerna i riksavtalet</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="2"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Ersättning från patientens hemlandsting enligt hemlandstingets kontrakt med vårdgivaren</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Beskrivning: Grundl��ggande informationsobjekt f��r dom��nen itintegration:registry (adressering av tj��nster)
Revisionshistorik: 2011-06-27 Mats Ekhammar, Callista Enterprise AB Added ServiceContractType
Datum: 2011-05-04 Beskrivning: Initial version F��rfattare: marcus.krantz@callistaenterprise.se</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="LogicalAddress" type="LogicalAddressType"/> <xs:element name="ServiceContract" type="ServiceContractType"/> <xs:simpleType name="LogicalAddressType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Defines the type for logical address according to national reference architecture. Superseeds wsa:To as type for logical address header in RIVTA 2.1.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="ServiceContractType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type which describes a service contract. Used in interaction GetSupportedServiceContracts.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ServiceContractNamespace" type="xs:anyURI"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" xmlns:urn1="urn:riv:clinicalprocess:activity:request:GetRequestStatusResponder:1" xmlns:urn2="urn:riv:clinicalprocess:activity:request:1"> <soapenv:Header> <urn:LogicalAddress>?</urn:LogicalAddress> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn1:GetRequestStatus> <urn2:requestId extension="?"/> <urn2:personId extension="?" root="?"/> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn1:typeOfRequest>?</urn1:typeOfRequest> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:timePeriod> <urn2:start value="?"/> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:end value="?"/> <!--You may enter ANY elements at this point--> </urn1:timePeriod> <!--You may enter ANY elements at this point--> </urn1:GetRequestStatus> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Call GetRequestStatus
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" xmlns:urn1="urn:riv:clinicalprocess:activity:request:GetRequestStatusResponder:1" xmlns:urn2="urn:riv:clinicalprocess:activity:request:1"> <soapenv:Header> <urn:LogicalAddress>${logicalAddress}</urn:LogicalAddress> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn1:GetRequestStatus> <urn2:requestId extension="${requestIdExtention}"/> <urn2:personId extension="${personIdExtention}" root="${personIdRoot}"/> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn1:typeOfRequest>${typeOfRequest}</urn1:typeOfRequest> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:timePeriod> <urn2:start value="${timePeriodStart}"/> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:end value="${timePeriodEnd}"/> <!--You may enter ANY elements at this point--> </urn1:timePeriod> <!--You may enter ANY elements at this point--> </urn1:GetRequestStatus> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
